title: Hideous Fiesta
description: “How dare you have a party on a day like this?” The comics collage 'Hideous Fiesta' by the Finnish visual artist and musician Heta Bilaletdin is a story about a mysterious party and questions of freedom.Format: A6, 28 pages, saddle stitch binding, full-color, EnglishSupport: Published with the financial assistance of FILI – Finnish Literature Exchange.
author: Heta Bilaletdin
